div.label: Energy consumption tracking by energy type
Extract from the judicial record - proof of registred activities
BON-1 not older than 30 days (Only applies to companies based in Croatia)
BON-2 not older than 30 days (Only applies to companies based in Croatia)
Extract from the Register not older than 30 days
Judicial record or an equivalent certificate of payment of social security contributions and payment of taxes (Only applies to companies based in Croatia)
Proof of prompt and complete payment of customs duties (Only applies to companies based in Croatia)
Proof that the subject has not seriously infringed or repeated infringed customs legislations (Only applies to companies based in Croatia)
Proof that there are no criminal proceedings being conducted against the director or any other responsible person (Not older than 30 days)
Evidence of insurance against liability (with a renowned assurance company) for mistakes made by employees or blank promissory note (Only applies to companies based in Croatia)
Evidence of IT and personnel support through affiliation with customs and tax offices:
The minimum requirement is the possession of licences for the appropriate customs application (Nova or other)
List of employees in permanent employment who are authorised to perform international freight forwarder jobs
Minimum 2 employees (Name, surname, OIB, job address, e-mail, phone, mobile)
Valid bank guarantee for import procedure and transit bank guarantee for transit procedures (Only applies to companies based in Croatia)
(Only applies to companies based in Croatia and to Agents and shipping agents)
Valid waste management permits (Only applies for companies that provide mechanical and
chemical cleaning services, hazardous substance management and non-hazardous waste.)
Confirmation that the subcontractor is a representative or distributor of another company
Is the Agent also a Shipping anget?
* If the answer to the last question is NO please fill this questionnaire and provide the necesery documunets for your Shipping agent also.

div.p: Your application has been successfully registered, we will get back to you soon.
